content: TWO New add-ons to Sportsbet.io!!  A NEW Sportsbet.io Clubhouse Telegram channel!!    Check it out here! >> https://t.me/+wvPQvHPCuA42Mzc0This first version of Telegram Clubhouse contains:> Official Sportsbet.io community in Telegram> Comment and copy bets shared from the Betting Bot by other community members> Take part in exclusive promotions and competitions you won’t get anywhere else    Telegram " Betting Bot "     Check it out here! >> @betting_botThis first version of Telegram @betting_bot  contains:> Leagues: World Cup only at the moment. More sports and leagues to be added soon.> Markets: 1x2, Asian Tota and Asian Handicap. More markets to be added soon.> Supported currency: USDT... More currencies to be added later> Betslip sharing:  Share all your bets automatically into Sportsbet.io Clubhouse Telegram channel> We value your privacy: Option to show / hide your username on the betslip.> Betting history: Check all your active and settled bets placed through the app> Balance: Your Sportsbet.io USDT balance visible inside the app> Transactions: Deposit and Withdraw USDT via ERC20 or TRC20 networks. comments.body: How to use for the first time!!1, Go to this Telegram Channel: https://t.me/betting_bot2. Click "Here" 3. Give the betting bot your sportsbet.io username and password.4. Good Luck and let us know what you think in the comments!

comments.body: Keeping in mind how prominent Telegram is within the Bitcoin and crypto community I am glad to see a casino taking a step forward and implement a functional bot like this one.
